DataElement.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Information Source Type Code PCORnet CDM Medical Condition Source Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens._Executed and carried through to completion._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._Where something is available or from where it originates._A coded value specifying an identifiable class of an entity or activity based on common qualities._The Patient-reported category can include reporting by a proxy, such as patients family or guardian.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Information Source Type Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens._Executed and carried through to completion._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._Where something is available or from where it originates._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Executed and carried through to completion.

An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredName: PCORnet CDM Medical Condition Source Code
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The Patient-reported category can include reporting by a proxy, such as patients family or guardian.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An algorithm designed to identify health conditions as defined by the National Patient-Centered Clinical Research Network.

Concepts.definition: An algorithm designed to identify health conditions as defined by the National Patient-Centered Clinical Research Network.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An official written record of names or events or transactions.: A group of individuals, identified by a common characteristic.

Concepts.definition: An official written record of names or events or transactions.
A group of individuals, identified by a common characteristic.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A list of health problems or conditions compiled through healthcare encounters.

Concepts.definition: A list of health problems or conditions compiled through healthcare encounters.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 1/25/23 added alt name for ticket number CADSR0001948 for CCTG cjl.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

Concepts.definition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.: A short textual account; having provided a short account.: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
